subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick hoped to come out of retirement to enter the United States Open with Mardy Fish, but Roddick was denied because he was not drug tested three months before the event.
snippet: Andy Roddick hoped to come out of retirement to enter the United States Open with Mardy Fish, but Roddick was denied because he was not drug tested three months before the event.
